scripts.minify:single: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < loader.css | postcss --use cssnano > loader.min.css
scripts.minify:css: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < loaders.css | postcss --use cssnano > loaders.min.css
scripts.single:bar: npm run build:bar && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:circles: npm run build:circles && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:default: npm run build:default && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:dots: npm run build:dots && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:heartbeat: npm run build:heartbeat && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:progress: npm run build:progress && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:pulsate: npm run build:pulsate && npm run minify:single
scripts.single:spinner: npm run build:spinner && npm run minify:single
